name: hitpoints
description: HitPoints aims to be a food-tracker, video game style.

scripts.install:all: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend && npm run install:client
scripts.install:frontend: npm run install:react && npm run install:react-native && npm run install:vue
scripts.start: npm run start:docker && npm run start:backend && npm run start:client && npm run start:frontend
scripts.start:frontend: npm run start:react && npm run start:vue && npm run start:react-native
scripts.restart:docker: npm run stop:docker && npm run build:docker && npm run start:docker
